articles.title: Vernon Winfrey, Oprah's father and former councilman, has died
articles.description: Vernon Winfrey, Oprah Winfrey's father, died late Friday, Oprah announced in a statement. He was 89.
articles.content:

articles.title: Sri Lanka: Protesters take a swim in presidential pool after storming palace  - CNN Video
articles.description: Hundreds of thousands of protesters broke into the presidential palace in Sri Lanka. The country has been facing a food, fuel, and medicine shortage not seen in 70 years. The country declared bankruptcy only days ago.

articles.title: Photos: Protesters storm Sri Lankan President's House
